com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc
Class FiniteField

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc.FiniteField
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrimeField
public abstract class FiniteField
extends java.lang.Object

This FiniteField class operates on integer arrays, but interprets them as elements of a finite field.
